document_data.name: ''Genie Slayer Sword''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Genie slayer swords''''' were magic weapons found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate, that specialized in harming [[genie]]s.{{Cite dragon/179/Wonders of the Land of Fate}}
document_data.Description: Though most commonly found as [[scimitar]]s, any type of sword could be enchanted with "genie slaying" properties.
document_data.Powers: ''Genie slayer swords'' made it much easier for the wielder to strike and harm any opponent. When facing any form of genie this power was amplified even further. Additionally, each ''genie slayer sword'' was enchanted to cause even more harm to a specific type of genie.
